parameters.toolDescription: Add new meal to user's personal meal library with macros per 100g. Supports slang names for quick future access. Use when user wants to save a new meal for future quick logging.

values.name: p_meal_data
values.description: JSONB object with meal details: {meal_name: string, slang_names: ARRAY of strings (e.g., ['яйца', 'глазунья']), calories_per_100g: number, protein_per_100g: number, carbs_per_100g: number, fat_per_100g: number (SINGULAR, NOT fats_per_100g!), fiber_per_100g?: number, default_portion_g?: number, portion_name?: string}
